member.name: IUIAnimationManager.AbandonAllStoryboards
member.summary: Abandons all active storyboards.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.CreateAnimationVariable
member.summary: Creates a new animation variable.
member.param: The initial value for the new animation variable.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.CreateStoryboard
member.summary: Creates a new storyboard.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.FinishAllStoryboards
member.summary: Finishes all active storyboards within the specified time interval.
member.param: The maximum time interval during which all storyboards must be finished.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.GetStatus
member.summary: Gets the status of the animation manager.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.GetStoryboardFromTag
member.summary: Gets the storyboard with the specified tag.
member.param: The object portion of the tag. This parameter can be NULL.
The identifier portion of the tag.
The storyboard that matches the specified tag, or NULL if no match is found.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.GetVariableFromTag
member.summary: Gets the animation variable with the specified tag.
member.param: The object portion of the tag. This parameter can be NULL.
The identifier portion of the tag.
The animation variable that matches the specified tag, or NULL if no match is found.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.Pause
member.summary: Pauses all animations.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.Resume
member.summary: Resumes all animations.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.ScheduleTransition
member.summary: Creates and schedules a single-transition storyboard.
member.param: A transition to be applied to the animation variable.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.SetAnimationMode
member.summary: Sets the animation mode.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.SetCancelPriorityComparison
member.summary: Sets the priority comparison handler to be called to determine whether a scheduled storyboard can be canceled.

param.name: comparison
param.para: The priority comparison handler for cancelation.
The specified object must implement the interface or be NULL.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.SetCompressPriorityComparison
member.summary: Sets the priority comparison handler to be called to determine whether a scheduled storyboard can be compressed.

param.name: comparison
param.para: The priority comparison handler for compression.
The specified object must implement the interface or be NULL. See Remarks.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.SetConcludePriorityComparison
member.summary: Sets the priority comparison handler to be called to determine whether a scheduled storyboard can be concluded.
member.param: The priority comparison handler for conclusion. The specified object must implement the interface or be NULL. See Remarks.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.SetDefaultLongestAcceptableDelay
member.summary: Sets the default acceptable animation delay. This is the length of time that may pass before storyboards begin.
member.param: The default delay. This parameter can be a positive value, or UI_ANIMATION_SECONDS_EVENTUALLY (-1) to indicate that any finite delay is acceptable.
member.returns:
If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.SetManagerEventHandler
member.summary: Specifies a handler for animation manager status updates.

param.name: handler
param.para: The event handler to be called when the status of the animation manager changes.
The specified object must implement the interface or be NULL.
See Remarks section for more information.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.SetTrimPriorityComparison
member.summary: Sets the priority comparison handler to be called to determine whether a scheduled storyboard can be trimmed.

param.name: comparison
param.para: The priority comparison handler for trimming.
The specified object must implement the interface or be NULL.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.Shutdown
member.summary: Shuts down the animation manager and all its associated objects.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager.Update
member.summary: Updates the values of all animation variables.
member.param: The current system time. This parameter must be greater than or equal to 0.0.
The result of the update. This parameter can be omitted from calls to this method.

returns.code: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationManager
member.summary: Defines the animation manager, which provides a central interface for creating and managing animations.
